name: TP Product Quick View for Woocommerce
author: TP Plugins

sections.description:
TP Product Quick View for Woocommerce adds a ‚Äòquick view‚Äô button to product loops that show product details in a lightbox when clicked with a lot of new features.
Let your customers Quick View to all product information by click and much more…

Learn more about TP Product Quick View for Woocommerce Plugin features.

DEMO

Click Here to Get the Pro Version

Free Plugin Features

  • Responsive Layout.
  • Quick View Button Type (text / icon / text and icon).
  • Quick View Link Label (Change “Quick View” Button name).
  • Quick View Button Position.
  • Close the lightbox by clicking the background overlay.
  • Customize “Quick View” color , background , font size and more…
  • Add to cart directly from Quick View.
  • Select Fields to Show: Product Rating, Product Price, Product Short Description, Product Long Description, Product Add to Cart, Product SKU, Product Categories, Product Tags, Product Attributes
  • 100% mobile friendly.
  • Working with Most of Premium themes.

Pro Version Features

  • Responsive Layout.
  • Navigate Between Products by Arrows.
  • Quick View Button Type (text / icon / text and icon).
  • Quick View Link Label (Change “Quick View” Button name).
  • Quick View Button Position.
  • Show Gallery if Product Have Gallery.
  • Change Big Image by Thumbnail onmouseover / click.
  • Close the lightbox by clicking the background overlay.
  • Show/Hide Gallery Thumbnails images.
  • Customize “Quick View” color , background , font size and more…
  • Add to cart directly from Quick View.
  • Ajax Add to cart directly from Quick View no Refresh Window.
  • Customize “SALE” color , background , font size.
  • Select Fields to Show: Product Rating, Product Price, Product Short Description, Product Long Description, Product Add to Cart, Product SKU, Product Categories, Product Tags, Product Attributes
  • Select Quantity Type: beautiful quantity with plus / minus buttons.
  • Show Related Products in Carousel Slider.
  • Custom CSS.
  • Share Buttons.
  • Change Lightbox Model Width / Height.
  • RTL support.
  • 100% mobile friendly.
  • Working with Most of Premium themes.

üëç You May Also Like

  • ‚úÖ TP Woocommerce Product Gallery

  • ‚úÖ TP Product Image Flipper for Woocommerce

  • ‚úÖ TP Products Compare for Woocommerce

  • ‚úÖ TP Product Tooltip for WooCommerce
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the downloaded zip file.
  2. Upload the plugin folder into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress site.
  3. Activate TP Product Quick View for Woocommerce through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

TP Product Quick View for Woocommerce will add a new menu item called ‚ÄúTP Product Quick View for Woocommerce‚Äù in wordpress menu. Here you are able to configure all the plugin settings.
sections.faq:
Do i need Woocommerce install in my site?

Of course, Our plugin works with Woocommerce so you need Woocommerce shop in your site.

What about mobile devices?

TP Product Quick View for Woocommerce is 100% Responsive and tested on any device and screen resolution.

I need a feature that you dont have

No problem! Contact Us Here and tell us what you need our team will be happy to help you.

Can I customize the Plugin?

Yes you can, go to plugin Settings and change colors, background, icons and more…

Can I use the Plugin with elementor?

Yes you can.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2 Update

  • Update – WordPress 6.3.2 compatibility
  • Update – WooCommerce 8.2.1 compatibility

1.0.1 – Update

  • Update – WordPress 5.8.2 compatibility
  • Update – WooCommerce 6.0.0 compatibility

1.0.0 – Released on 10 April 2021

  • Initial release
